channel.title: Https://adoptics.com
channel.description:
Hi All! I am happy to show our new service that we just released, AdOptics.
AdOptics provides a conversion improvement service that operates at the ad level. The main component of the service is automated A/B testing for Google Ads. Think Unbounce for ads instead of landing pages.
